description: Try our easy to follow Sparkling Pink Tea recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sparkling Pink Tea Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2L chilled lemonade or sparkling mineral water

recipeInstructions.text: Hull and halve strawberries (they'll look heart-shaped) and place in the freezer until solid.
Combine Concentrated Apple & Raspberry Cordial with 2L chilled lemonade or sparkling mineral water in large jugs or tea pots.
Decorate with frozen strawberries and mint leaves.
